
Intercepted comms used RSA, but the public modulus is a Blum integer. Can you recover the secret message? Ciphertext: 5660096417810925107054802705368899142287404859986699724884309564561647362726433874142239749617057285548383793282787077158599243227375229529813863811824899


The flag format is flag{...}
n=5803465761095639906862801812179308540835468813552115627877267383002778494236069487891480339843844650221660939720531598047462436815277516787889984040464833, e=4138721888410752698730060621197867895217038301633388301284751552329196171451047878050236577739785714926774114160324880402022001707928551154980362966402527
The lower 104 bits of p are: 65211267283342741745965916375107334719


---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{lqoej3iq}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 5660096417810925107054802705368899142287404859986699724884309564561647362726433874142239749617057285548383793282787077158599243227375229529813863811824899
vulnerability: blum integers
hint: Blum integers are products of primes congruent to 3 modulo 4. These integers have unique properties in cryptography.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=5803465761095639906862801812179308540835468813552115627877267383002778494236069487891480339843844650221660939720531598047462436815277516787889984040464833, e=4138721888410752698730060621197867895217038301633388301284751552329196171451047878050236577739785714926774114160324880402022001707928551154980362966402527
The lower 104 bits of p are: 65211267283342741745965916375107334719

extra_info: p=61969254536096534096264429001475642538362632742482971675451427252958323372607, q=93650727357308667214477230203778763957362514635124652638692628355415232977919, Ï†(n)=5803465761095639906862801812179308540835468813552115627877267383002778494235913867909586934642533908562455685314035872900084829190963372732281610484114308
